name: Find and Bond - GDKO 2023 Round 2
description:
Goal: Find and convince your new combat director to like you by understanding his music taste.

This game was developed for round 2 of the GDKO game jam tournament. 

Task: Tell a story using sound.

Controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys to Move
  • Space to Interact/Talk
  • QWER (Mini Game)

Combat Controls (Only in Training Room):

  • Mouse to Aim
  • Left Mouse Button to Shot

Music: 

  • "Auto" by Vodovoz
  • "Take Care" by OkayJml
  • "Short & Sweet" by Aloster

Floors & Walls: https://petricakegames.itch.io/cosmic-lilac
